"Racing the Phantom Mother":
"Runaway Ether activity on the Moon has
created a giant Phantom reading.
Now, the Ether is trying to form a pillar
that will carry the giant Phantom down
to the surface of the Earth.
All ARKS are to use the new and improved
Rideroids to intercept the target.
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest Clear Limit: $(0) time(s)
Failure: Time limit expires."

"We're ready to transfer you
to the giant Phantom that
appeared on the lunar surface!"

"The target is moving at high speed,
so you'll need to bring it down with
Rideroids before you can fight it!"
